data.title: NCDHHS: DPH: NC Vital Records: Order a Certificate
data.text:
游띔 Stop. Do NOT order from this page. You need to do an amendment.

Go to the Changes/Amendments page.

Online Orders through VitalChek

The current processing time for online or phone orders placed through VitalChek is 30 days - 3 months, depending on certificate type and year.

Use the button link below to order online through VitalChek, the츽 only츽 authorized vendor for a state-issued, certified birth certificate.

VitalChek is an independent service. VitalChek charges a processing fee, and all major credit cards are accepted, including American Express, Discover, MasterCard or VISA. VitalChek also accepts personal checks.

You will be asked to provide your credit card number and its expiration date.

Provide all the칙춾necessary certificate information칙춾along with a street address (no APO, FPO, or PO Boxes) where the certificate can be delivered.

If you choose the UPS overnight option, someone must be available at the address provided to sign for receipt of the document(s).

Online and Phone Order Processing Fees

Service Cost NC State Search Fee (includes one certificate)* $24.00 VitalChek Processing Fee $13.95 Regular Shipping (USPS) $0.00 Optional Overnight Shipping within continental U.S. (UPS)** $20.00 TOTAL (Regular Shipping/Overnight) $37.95/$57.95

* Includes one certificate if the record is located.칙춾Search fees and expedite fees are nonrefundable even if a record is not located when searching based on the information provided by the applicant.

** Documents will be shipped after the state search process is complete.츽 Processing times may be found on the processing dates page.

Phone Orders through VitalChek

The current processing time for online or phone orders placed through VitalChek is 30 days - 3 months, depending on certificate type and year.

Call Toll-Free

1-800-669-8310 (Outside the U.S., call 1-615-372-6800)

VitalChek is the츽 only츽 authorized vendor for a state-issued, certified birth certificate.

VitalChek is an independent service. VitalChek charges a processing fee, and all major credit cards are accepted, including American Express, Discover, MasterCard or VISA. VitalChek also accepts personal checks.

You will be asked to provide your credit card number and its expiration date.

Provide all the칙춾necessary certificate information칙춾along with a street address (no APO, FPO, or PO Boxes) where the certificate can be delivered.

If you choose the UPS overnight option, someone must be available at the address provided to sign for receipt of the document(s).

Online and Phone Order Processing Fees

Service Cost NC State Search Fee (includes one certificate)* $24.00 VitalChek Processing Fee $13.95 Regular Shipping (USPS) $0.00 Optional Overnight Shipping within continental U.S. (UPS)** $20.00 TOTAL (Regular Shipping/Overnight) $37.95/$57.95

* Includes one certificate if the record is located.칙춾Search fees and expedite fees are nonrefundable even if a record is not located when searching based on the information provided by the applicant.

** Documents will be shipped after the state search process is complete.츽 Processing times may be found on the processing dates page.

The current processing time for mailed-in certificate orders is 30 days - 3 months, depending on certificate type and year.

Mail order applications should be sent to the attention of VitalChek with payment made to VitalChek. Be sure to use the mailing address below to submit your completed form(s) and payment.

To Place an Order

Complete, print, and sign the appropriate form below.

Include $24 for the first copy of the certificate and $15 for each additional certificate, plus the VitalChek processing fee noted on the application. VitalChek accepts payment by personal check, credit card, or money orders.

Make payment to "VitalChek".

Do NOT send cash.

Do NOT send an expedited fee. Expedited service is currently only available for regular certificate requests (not for amendments or corrections) by visiting us at the state office. If you would like to obtain your certificate in person, please make an appointment.츽 Alternatively, you may visit the Register of Deeds office where the event occurred to obtain your certificate. In most cases, the Register of Deeds can provide a copy of your certificate on the same day.

Do NOT send overpayment, as it may result in processing delays.

North Carolina Vital Records

ATTN: VC Certificate Orders

1903 Mail Service Center

Raleigh, NC 27699-1900

If no record is found, you will be sent a letter.칙춾The $24 search fee is nonrefundable even if a record is not located.

Standard Ordering Forms

Adoptions

Birth certificates issued after adoptions occur follow a different process and use different forms than regular birth certificate orders. See the Adoptions page for process and forms.

Birth Certificate Application Form

Application for a Copy of a North Carolina Birth Certificate

Spanish: Solicitud de copia de acta de nacimiento de Carolina de Norte

Death Certificate Application Form

Application for a Copy of a North Carolina Death Certificate

Spanish: Solicitud de copia de acta de defunci칩n de Carolina del Norte

Divorce Certificate Application Form

Application for a Copy of a North Carolina Divorce Certificate

Spanish: Solicitud de copia de acta de divorcio de Carolina del Norte

Marriage Certificate Application Form

Application for a North Carolina Marriage Record

Spanish: Solicitud de copia de acta de matrimonio de Carolina del Norte

Report of Fetal Death and Certificate of Birth Resulting in Stillbirth Application Form

Application for a Copy of a North Carolina Report of Fetal Death and/or Certificate of Birth Resulting in Stillbirth

Spanish: Solicitud de copia de acta de nacimiento sin vida/informe de defunci칩n fetal de Carolina del Norte

You will need a PDF reader, such as츽 Adobe Acrobat Reader, to use the forms and save copies to your machine. Note that not all web browsers handle opening of PDF files in the same manner. If you have problems opening the form from your web browser, try downloading or saving the document to your computer first (right-click on the link and select "Save link as") and then opening the saved document on your machine from within your PDF reader (i.e., File > Open).

Birth, death and marriage certificates칙춾may be obtained at the칙춾Register of Deeds칙춾칙춾(ROD) office in the county where the event took place. For example, in the case of death of a resident of North Carolina that occurred in a county other than the county of residence, the county where the death occurred would be the correct RODs office from which to obtain a death certificate (not the RODs office in the county of residence). In most cases, certificates can be obtained from the Register of Deeds on the same day.

Note: NC Vital Records is the only office from which you may obtain a birth certificate for an adopted child.

Current NC Vital Vital Records processing times for regular certificate requests that do not involve changes/amendments.
